name: Noelle Silva | Black Clover
description:
Lora of Noelle Silva from Black Clover

For your normal clothes:

mage_dress,white dress, cleavage, bare shoulder ,long sleeves,

mage_dress,white dress, cleavage, capelet, long sleeves,

With a weight between 0.7 and 0.8.

For the Valkyrie outfit:

((water_armor)),(wings),crown, valkyrie, armored dress, angel,

holding water sword

-At least in what I tried the suit blends well with other characters, but you have to find the right weight

With a weight between 0.7 and 0.8.

For the Mermaid outfit:

cleavage, tiara, monster girl, (mermaid:1.1), water, navel, bare shoulders, hair ribbon, shell, scales, underwater,

With a weight between 0.7 and 0.8.

For the Bikini:

swimsuit, bikini, side-tie bikini bottom, (yellow bikini:1.3), outdoors, beach, sand, water, sky, day, cloud

-This one is not very consistent, so don't expect much from the bikini

With a weight between 0.7 and 0.8.

--For the rest of the suit, a weight between 0.5 and 0.6 was used.

Clarifications

It is recommended to use a high weight in the negative prompt in tags such as text, username, patreon_username, watermark

If you want to put other clothes on it, you may want to use mage_dress and choker at the prompt negative

Recommended weight between 0.5 and 0.8.

For all the photos the model yesmix v15 was used

You can download the photos to see the complete specifications
